1.text: Pull out and clean the mascara wand with warm water and soap.

2.text: Pour a water-based makeup remover into the mascara tube.
2.vid: /6/6d/Clean Out a Mascara Tube Step 2 Version 2.360p.mp4

3.text: Pump the mascara wand in the tube to loosen the mascara.
3.vid: /2/20/Clean Out a Mascara Tube Step 3 Version 2.360p.mp4

4.text: Recap the tube and let the makeup remove soak the interior for 3 hours.

5.text: Pour the makeup remover out of the tube onto a paper towel.
5.vid: /1/13/Clean Out a Mascara Tube Step 5 Version 2.360p.mp4

6.text: Check for and remove the rubber insert if your mascara tube has one.
6.vid: /e/e2/Clean Out a Mascara Tube Step 6 Version 2.360p.mp4

7.text: Submerge your mascara tube and wand in warm water and dish soap.

8.text: Use the mascara wand to loosen the mascara inside of the tube.
8.vid: /1/1f/Clean Out a Mascara Tube Step 8 Version 2.360p.mp4

9.text: Dunk the mascara tube into freshwater to get rid of the soap.
9.vid: /4/42/Clean Out a Mascara Tube Step 9 Version 2.360p.mp4

10.text: Rinse out the tube and wand with rubbing alcohol.

11.text: Let the tube and wand air-dry in the sun.

12.text: Add new products to your mascara tube if desired.
